mapper.sql:
o.guid, o.sessiontype, o.logtime, o.createtime, o.createuserguid, (select u.username from sa_user u where u.guid = o.createuserguid) createusername, o.updatetime, o.updateuserguid, (select u.username from sa_user u where u.guid = o.updateuserguid) updateusername,
o.h0, o.h1, o.h2, o.h3, o.h4, o.h5, o.h6, o.h7, o.h8, o.h9, o.h10, o.h11, o.h12, o.h13, o.h14, o.h15, o.h16, o.h17, o.h18, o.h19, o.h20, o.h21, o.h22, o.h23
mapper.select:
select from sa_license_occupied o
and o.sessiontype = #SESSIONTYPE#
and o.logtime = #LOGTIME#
and o.logtime >= #TIMEFROM#
and o.logtime <= #TIMETO#
mapper.insert:
insert into sa_license_occupied (guid, sessiontype, logtime,
h0, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime ) values (#GUID#, #SESSIONTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LOGTIME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#H0:NUMERIC#, #H1:NUMERIC#, #H2:NUMERIC#, #H3:NUMERIC#, #H4:NUMERIC#, #H5:NUMERIC#, #H6:NUMERIC#, #H7:NUMERIC#, #H8:NUMERIC#, #H9:NUMERIC#, #H10:NUMERIC#, #H11:NUMERIC#, #H12:NUMERIC#, #H13:NUMERIC#, #H14:NUMERIC#, #H15:NUMERIC#, #H16:NUMERIC#, #H17:NUMERIC#, #H18:NUMERIC#, #H19:NUMERIC#, #H20:NUMERIC#, #H21:NUMERIC#, #H22:NUMERIC#, #H23:NUMERIC#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update:
update sa_license_occupied
updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, h0=#H0#, h1=#H1#, h2=#H2#, h3=#H3#, h4=#H4#, h5=#H5#, h6=#H6#, h7=#H7#, h8=#H8#, h9=#H9#, h10=#H10#, h11=#H11#, h12=#H12#, h13=#H13#, h14=#H14#, h15=#H15#, h16=#H16#, h17=#H17#, h18=#H18#, h19=#H19#, h20=#H20#, h21=#H21#, h22=#H22#, h23=#H23#,
guid=#GUID# SESSIONTYPE=#SESSIONTYPE# logtime=#TIME#

update sa_license_occupied
updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, h0=h0+1 h1=h1+1 h2=h2+1 h3=h3+1 h4=h4+1 h5=h5+1 h6=h6+1 h7=h7+1 h8=h8+1 h9=h9+1 h10=h10+1 h11=h11+1 h12=h12+1 h13=h13+1 h14=h14+1 h15=h15+1 h16=h16+1 h17=h17+1 h18=h18+1 h19=h19+1 h20=h20+1 h21=h21+1 h22=h22+1 h23=h23+1
where sessiontype=#SESSIONTYPE# and logtime=#LOGTIME#
mapper.delete:
delete from sa_license_occupied
and guid=#GUID# and sessiontype=#SESSIONTYPE# and logtime=#LOGTIME#
